name: Dino Dan: Dino Adventure
description:
*** Special Introductory Price - Limited Time ***

Live an ordinary day in the extraordinary life of Dino Dan with Dino Adventure!

With this interactive point-and-click adventure game, you can help solve a dino experiment by finding and cleverly combining items just like Dino Dan does on the show.

The fun starts when Dan discovers a mystery dino under his bed, setting off an adventure that will take you from Dan’s room to his school and everywhere in between, to find out what it is and how it got there. You’ll have to use your brains, imagination and knowledge of the show to figure out this perplexing prehistoric puzzle. But don’t worry about getting stuck — there are lots of clues to help you along if you need them!

This game is brought to you by the makers of Dino Dan, the hit children's television series.
